Double Punch/Manterror:


::Double Punch nodded to himself, activating his com::
<Manterror, meet me at Section 2.45 of the base, prepare to escort someone to 
Hell Beast>

<Understood, Double Punch> (Manterror replied, quickly heading for the 
coordinates)


::Manterorr eventually arrived, looking to Bright Blade:: "A new femme?" 
::Manterror aims his ion discs at Bright Blade::
"You go forward, I'll tell you where to go.  Any resistance."
(He says as they both head for Hell Beast)

**Don't mean to mode by having her go, but I'm doing that to save time, so if 
Bright Blade doesn't want to do that, she can just say so in her next e-mail 
and my action of moving them both will become void
